content.section:
PIWI is web-centric and so it supports features and helpers which are quite usable for creating websites.
PIWI is here to integrate different datasources like CMS, flat files or databases, change that input into PIWI-XML and then serialize it in multiple formats like HTML or PDF. Currently PIWI focus is in generating XML from different sources and transforming it into HTML.
PIWI is not a CMS. If you are looking for something which enables you to edit your content within an online HTML editor or similar, you are wrong.
